verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I offer myself To You, oh, Lord. To be a place for you to dwell. Refine me, oh my God And purify my heart{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}That I may be in Your bride. Ah, Lord God, itâ€™s You I pursue To know and cherish all my days. I want to bless and give to You With love from the issues of my heart.{/lang-eng}
